p: Simply because the intimate connections between public health and economic health are obvious, the temptation exists to focus on both at the same time. However, decisions to re-open economies prematurely can result in rebound of widespread infection ( Kissler et al., 2020), resulting in yet further economic and public health damage. WBE could facilitate the properly timed and targeted shutdown and re-opening of specific geographic areas, especially if this must become an alternating episodic strategy for the duration of a pandemic. WBE would also avoid the problems in individual diagnostic or surveillance testing caused by missing those individuals who eschew testing or because they lack the means to seek or be tested.
